title: Touch 2: Sayonara no Okurimono
original_name: タッチ 2 さよならの贈り物
opening_song: Sayonara no Okurimono (さよならの贈り物) by Bread & Butter
ending_song: Kishibe no Photograph (岸辺のフォトグラフ) by Bread & Butter
sinopse:
Compilation movie of the second year of the Touch timeline. Plotwise, the movie doesn't have much to do with the series second year.

(Source: AniDB)
